WELCOME TO VOCABFUSION!

This is a platform designed to help you expand your vocabulary in an engaging and interactive way.

The purpose of VocabFusion is to help learners enhance their vocabulary skills by integrating engaging activities, interactive content, and real-life applications to make language learning fun, meaningful, and effective.

What is inside VocabFusion:

  • Reviewer
  • Activities:
    • Flashcards
    • Quiz
    • Match

Study these 25 Vocabulary Words

  • Abstain – to deliberately avoid or refrain from something
  • Alleviate – to reduce pain or make something less severe
  • Aloof – emotionally distant or uninvolved
  • Ambiguous – having more than one meaning; unclear
  • Belligerent – hostile and aggressive
  • Candid – honest and straightforward
  • Concur – to agree with someone or something
  • Convoluted – extremely complex and difficult to follow
  • Credible – believable or trustworthy
  • Cynical – distrustful of others’ motives or sincerity
  • Demeanor – outward behavior or conduct
  • Diligent – showing care and effort in work or duties
  • Eloquent – fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing
  • Empathy – the ability to understand and share the feelings of others
  • Feasible – possible and practical to do easily or conveniently
  • Formidable – inspiring fear or respect through being large or powerful
  • Frivolous – not having any serious purpose or value
  • Imminent – about to happen very soon
  • Indignant – feeling or showing anger at unfair treatment
  • Mundane – lacking excitement; dull or ordinary
  • Obsolete – outdated or no longer used
  • Omniscient – knowing everything
  • Paradox – a situation that seems contradictory but may be true
  • Persevere – to keep going despite difficulty
  • Reiterate – to say or do something again for emphasis
